data.name: ParagraphStyle
desc: specifies a style sheet for paragraphs within a com.sun.star.text.Text.

properties.name: Category
desc: determines the category of a paragraph style.

properties.name: CharDiffHeightAsian
desc: This value contains the character height as difference in point to the height of the character in the parent style in Asian text.

properties.name: CharDiffHeightComplex
desc: This value contains the character height as difference in point to the height of the character in the parent style in complex text.

properties.name: CharPropHeight
desc: This value contains the character height as percentage value relative to the height of the character in the parent style.

properties.name: CharPropHeightAsian
desc: This value contains the character height as percentage value relative to the height of the character in the parent style in Asian text.

properties.name: CharPropHeightComplex
desc: This value contains the character height as percentage value relative to the height of the character in the parent style in complex text.

properties.name: PageStyleName
desc: returns the name of the page style in use
For setting the page style you have to use the com.sun.star.text.PageDescName properties.

properties.name: ParaBottomMarginRelative
desc: determines the Bottom margin of the paragraph relative to the ParaBottomMargin of the parent style.
If the value of ParaBottomMarginRelative is 100 the current ParaBottomMargin value is used.

properties.name: ParaLeftMarginRelative
desc: determines the left margin of the paragraph relative to the ParaLeftMargin of the parent style.
If the value of ParaLeftMarginRelative is 100 the current ParaLeftMargin value is used.

properties.name: ParaRightMarginRelative
desc: determines the right margin of the paragraph relative to the ParaRightMargin of the parent style.
If the value of ParaRightMarginRelative is 100 the current ParaRightMargin value is used.

properties.name: ParaTopMarginRelative
desc: determines the top margin of the paragraph relative to the ParaTopMargin of the parent style.
If the value of ParaTopMarginRelative is 100 the current ParaTopMargin value is used.
